sentence.Network_en: Trial by jury and the law of habeas corpus were practically suspended.
sentence.Network_cn: 陪审团审讯和人身保护法实际上都已废除.

sentence.Network_en: And under imperative necessity , he abolished the writ of habeas corpus.
sentence.Network_cn: 在紧急形势下, 他废除了人身保护令.

sentence.Network_en: They also developed prerogative orders and Habeas Corpus.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们还发展出了特权令和人身保护权.

list.abs: 人身保护状（Writ of Habeas Corpus）中之Habeas Corpus系拉丁文，意指：「人身占有」。用于英美刑事法律类似我国宪法第八条 …
habanera 哈巴涅拉habeas corpus 人身保护权haberdasher 男服经销商
...第十五号修正案对于妇女的投票权更是只字未提。成文法国会在1867年阐明联邦人身保护令(habeas corpus)的适用范围，给予联邦法院取消各州法院非法定罪或判决的权力.

auth_sentence.content: These presidents also correctly suspended habeas corpus for the enemy.
auth_sentence.res_content: These presidents also correctly suspended habeas corpus for the enemy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These presidents also correctly suspended habeas corpus for the enemy.

auth_sentence.content: Circuit appeals court for the habeas cases.
auth_sentence.res_content: Circuit appeals court for the habeas cases.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Circuit appeals court for the habeas cases.

auth_sentence.content: Suspended the writ of habeas corpus along a particular military route.
auth_sentence.res_content: Suspended the writ of habeas corpus along a particular military route.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Suspended the writ of habeas corpus along a particular military route.
